# Joe Cala - Sales Training & Leadership Development

## Core Pages
- https://josephacala.com/ : Home Page. Primary landing for Dealerships and Individuals.
- https://josephacala.com/about/ : Joseph Cala Bio & Mission.
- https://josephacala.com/what-we-do/ : Methodology overview (Faith, Discipline, Training).
- https://josephacala.com/contact/ : Booking and Contact information.

## Services
- https://josephacala.com/mentorship/ : Individual Sales Training Program ($27/mo).
- https://josephacala.com/corporate/ : Dealership & Corporate Consulting.
- https://josephacala.com/academy/ : Online Course Catalog.

## Industries
- https://josephacala.com/industries/ : Overview of industry solutions.
- https://josephacala.com/industries/powersports/ : Powersports, RV, Marine training.
- https://josephacala.com/industries/real-estate/ : Real Estate sales training.
- https://josephacala.com/industries/high-ticket/ : Luxury Retail and Tech sales.
